alert.note: Alert for Albany; Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 5:36PM EDT until August 20 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Albany County in east central New York... North central Greene County in east central New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 536 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Preston Hollow, or 14 miles north of Hunter, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Westerlo, Preston-Potter Hollow, Preston Hollow, Durham, Rensselaerville, Shoefelt Corners, Norton Hill, South Westerlo, Cooksburg, West Durham, Dormansville, Smith Corner, Medusa, Cornwallville, Potter Hollow, Lambs Corner, Oak Hill and East Windham. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
